newsitem.title: USA: Valero to restart Houston cat cracker unit midweek.
newsitem.headline: Valero to restart Houston cat cracker unit midweek.

text.p: Valero Energy Corp said Monday it will restart the downed 61,000-barrel-per-day fluid catalytic cracker (FCC) at its Houston, Texas, refinery in the next few days.
"We should have the unit up and running Wednesday or Thursday," said Keith Booke, a company spokeman.
The unit was taken down a week ago after an expander in the FCC unit began to vibrate. Valero had said the unit would be out of service for seven to eight days.
"We decided while we had the unit down to also do a mini turnaround," said Booke.
"We had originally planned to do a scheduled turnaround on the unit in 1998. Now that has been extended until 1999."
